pullRequest.title: Fix problem with creating a group union
pullRequest.bodyText:
there was a problem when two groups (for example 'A' and 'AB' was incorrectly checked as predecessors. Only prefix of groups should be test there
for this reason, we need to set result group as the full prefix using ':' character on it's name end

nodes.bodyText: This will affect all (de)serialization of the Group object. It you make it utils method, we can have this change as a quick fix in the nearest release. Otherwise it must me updated on other places too and we must notify other parties before deployment.

commit.message:
Fix problem with creating a group union

 - there was a problem when two groups (for example 'A' and 'AB' was
   incorrectly checked as predecessors. Only prefix of groups should be
   test there
 - for this reason, we need to set result group as the full prefix using
   ':' character on it's name end

beforeCommit.message:
Fix problem with creating a group union

 - there was a problem when two groups (for example 'A' and 'AB' was
   incorrectly checked as predecessors. Only prefix of groups should be
   test there
 - new method to get prefix of Group was added to object Group
 - test of getting prefix was added
 - logic around groupUnion check was changed to prevent situation
   defined above

afterCommit.message:
Fix problem with creating a group union

 - there was a problem when two groups (for example 'A' and 'AB' was
   incorrectly checked as predecessors. Only prefix of groups should be
   test there
 - for this reason, we need to set result group as the full prefix using
